title: Learning Engagement Motivation Design Strategies Based on Citizen Science Games (CSG)

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental science knowledge and digital tool proficiency
context.additional_context: A course for current science professionals to learn strategic approaches for resolving motivation challenges in citizen science game design

learning_goals: Learners can analyze participation motivation factors in citizen science games from a scientific communication perspective
Learners can suggest optimization plans for in-game task design and interfaces through user experience (UX) improvements
Learners can apply gamification strategies that promote sustained engagement to real-world projects
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
